description.value:
Without fully transforming your body, you gain one animalistic feature, which you select from the list below each time you Cast the Spell.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.dCQCzapIk53xmDo5]{Cat Eyes} You gain Low-Light Vision.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.2wfrhRLmmgPSKbAZ]{Claws} You gain a claw attack that deals 1d6 slashing damage and has the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.GhGoZdAZtzZTYCzj]{Jaws} You gain a jaws attack that deals 1d8 piercing damage and has the unarmed trait.

Heightened (4th) Add the following options to the list you can choose from.

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Xlwt1wpjEKWBLUjK]{Fish Tail} You gain a Swim Speed equal to your land Speed.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.mr6mlkUMeStdChxi]{Owl Eyes} You gain Darkvision.
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.1VuHjj32wge2gPOr]{Wings} You gain a Fly Speed equal to your land Speed.
